title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Spanish version]
creator_credit: Peter Lake and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: At a family picnic by a river, a father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Spanish.
